website_summaries.verdict: Two-in-one product at a very low price point with both a fine grooming comb and a flea comb.
pros: 2 combs, and both are stored inside an included guard for convenience
One comb works for clearing small tangles, while the other comb catches fleas and eggs
Low cost, considering you receive two products for one price
cons: Handles are extremely small and uncomfortable to use for long periods

customer_reviews.title: Best flea comb there is...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this combs. I have two now in different colors. I prefer this style if holding compared to the traditional combs. Combs to me are hard to maneuver on bellies, armpits, legs, necks and so on. Plus I’ve never had a comb that the tip didn’t pull hair. I try to get lighter color comb colors so that the fleas/flea dirt are easier seen on lighter colored combs. Everything is contained in one small unit, perfect for traveling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pookums65

customer_reviews.title: Great combs for cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use the combs on my cats (DSH) and dogs (cattle dogs and husky types). They’re very sturdy and so great for getting small mats and loose hair. I use them all the time mostly because all the animals loved to be brushed - even the foster kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: ...for ticks, too
customer_reviews.text: Great for combing out *$ ticks before they attach to my pets. Ticks seem to march around in the fur a lot before embedding, which means after the pet comes inside, there's a chance the tick will hop off onto the furniture or onto YOU. I comb right after letting the pet inside.
customer_reviews.author: AP Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! I have 6 cats and I love this comb. It’s durable and cleans easily when combing several little fur babies!! Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Brady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great combs. Good size. Use on cat or dog. I also use these for deshedding too.
customer_reviews.author: robin maye

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don’t really care for it, it is big...I prefer smaller comb
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Kitty comb and flea comb !
customer_reviews.text: That my cat likes it and will let me comb her hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it cannot mes in a case and it works for grooming too.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is such an excellent comb, if you haven't bought it yet, BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Karlena

customer_reviews.title: The tiny comb is good for cats
customer_reviews.text: The tiny comb is good for cats. The actually like the feel of it The bigger one is pretty useless, imho.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use the shorter teeth comb to clean my shih tzu's eyes every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Pinzel

product_meta.title: JW Pet Company Flea and Fine Comb
product_meta.description: Two-in-one grooming tool! Palm sized fine-tooth comb with separate flea comb, all in convenient carrying case. Stainless steel tines help remove tangles and smooth's hair. Flea comb great for parting hair at skin level to find small pests on pets. Flea combs remove fleas and eggs and this brush is aptly sized to groom your dog's face and eye. As you straighten your dog's hair, the fine comb effortlessly clears out tangles and mats.
feature_bullets: Two-in-one grooming: fine tooth comb and separate flea comb
Fine comb clears out tangles and mats

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
